existing_features.title: Remove the “Important Legal Notice” section and any other legal/novelty disclaimer messaging from the marketing homepage so customers are not shown legal/novelty notices while browsing.

Remove legal/novelty notice UI from the order page, including the warning alert and the lawful-use attestation requirement, so users can submit an order without acknowledging a novelty/legal disclaimer.

Remove legal/novelty notice wording from other customer-facing ordering-flow pages where it appears (e.g., prices page and order confirmation content), ensuring customers are not shown legal/novelty disclaimer notices anywhere in the flow.

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove all Legal Notice and novelty notice from the ordering flow (user will tell customers themselves)

projectName: Remove legal and novelty notices from the customer ordering experience
